attributes.action: Reduced TAX on after market LPG conversions to cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My vehicle was converted to LPG from petrol after I bought it but still have to pay full tax but if it was a factory fitted I would have reduced road tax. I do not want a grant to help pay for the convertion but I think it would only be fair if I was charged the same for my road tax as a factory fitted item.
